name: Lee's Run
description:
Play as Feng Lee, aspiring martial artist, and collect the chi to improve your kung fu.

Design Process:

The major change I've made in the process is definitely the art. I created the pixel artwork through the piskel app from the ground up and made the player animations through Construct.

What came up playtesting was the lack of challenge and proper level layout. I've addressed these issues by fixing the platforms and increasing the speed of the rocks throughout the levels to give the game a gradual challenge that invites the player, rather than punishing them.
